incidents.name: A Subset of Outbound Voice Call Failures

incident_updates.body: The subset of outbound US Voice call failures with symptoms including post dial delay, dead air, and duplicate calls arriving back to back has been resolved and the service is functioning normally at this time.
We are seeing recovery for outbound US calls. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have seen improvement in the reduction in the number of outbound US call failures with symptoms including post dial delay, dead air, and duplicate calls arriving back to back. incidents.name: SMS/MMS Delivery Failures to Multiple US Networks from a Subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: SMS/MMS delivery was degraded for 19 minutes between 9:07 AM and 9:26 AM Pacific Time on December 6th, 2022. During this period, customers may have experienced SMS/MMS delivery failures when sending to multiple US networks from a subset of short codes. The issue has now been resolved.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with SMS/MMS delivery from US short codes which occurred for 19 minutes between 9:07 AM and 9:26 AM Pacific Time on December 6th, 2022.  During this period, customers may have experienced SMS / MMS delivery failure when sending to multiple US networks from a subset of short codes. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incidents.name: Adding Number to Flex Proxy Service Overrides Voice Configuration

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing Flex Proxy Service issues. The incident has been resolved

Legacy Flex (Flex 1.0) customers who are experiencing issues while adding a new phone number to the Flex Proxy Service, where the voice configuration is overridden, can find a workaround in the following documentation: https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/11466927685275-Proxy-Overwritting-Incoming-Phone-Number-Webhooks. Our Flex Proxy Service is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue with adding a new phone number to the Flex Proxy Service causes the voice configuration of a phone number to be overridden. This issue only affects legacy Flex (Flex 1.0) customers who have actively added/removed phone numbers. This does not affect any ongoing traffic. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue where adding a new phone number to the Flex Proxy Service causes the voice configuration of a phone number to be overridden. This issue only affects legacy Flex (Flex 1.0) customers who have actively added/removed phone numbers. This does not affect any ongoing traffic. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue where adding a new phone number to the Flex Proxy Service causes the voice configuration of a phone number to be overridden. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
